summary: Rome is the capital of Italy and one of the oldest cities in Europe, with a history spanning 28 centuries. It was once the center of the powerful Roman Empire and is now a major tourist destination, attracting 8.6 million visitors in 2019. Rome is known for its beautiful architecture, art, and culture, including famous landmarks like the Vatican City, which is an independent country within Rome. The city has been influenced by many cultures over the years, including the Renaissance and Baroque periods, making it a significant place for art and fashion. Rome is also home to many important international organizations and companies.
title: Rome
